thread.title: List of Lost References

author: Nightlily
title: List of Lost References
text: Mary Margaret is reading The Mysterious Island by Jules Verne in the diner . [33] [34] This is a reference to the main location on Lost , which is a mysterious island. [34] Mary Margaret is grabbing an Apollo bar off the store shelf when she bumps into Kathryn . [35] Snow White is sitting on a tree log with branches just like the one with Claire and Ethan sat on. Edit A box from the Hall of Records is from aisle 08, section 4. [36] 4 and 8 are two of the Lost numbers. Regina 's secret meeting in the woods takes place at Access Road 23. 23 is one of the Lost numbers. [37] Emma crashes her police cruiser into a street sign where the roads are numbered 4 and 23. [38] Emma's printout mentions the address "Dominion Street, Unit 4", [39] a reference to the first Lost number. Edit At The Rabbit Hole , as Ruby says, " Ash , check out those guys", a bottle of MacCutcheon Scotch Whiskey is sitting on a shelf behind the bar (only seen from a distance - it's at the top of the second shelf from the right). [40] The number 23 is on a door by the entrance to the psychiatric ward at the hospital . [41] The number 8 is on a door in the hallway inside the psychiatric ward. [42] Edit The stranger says that his name is August . August is the 8th month of the year, and the second Lost number. Regina tells Henry: "The occasion is I love you" when she gives him a present. Those same words are said by Penny to Desmond in Season 3. Edit Astrid tells Leroy that the nuns only sold 42 candles last year. The phone record of Kathryn's call with David is listed as 8 minutes long [43] (as Sidney points out). Edit When Snow White and Red Riding Hood are looking for tracks in the woods, Red says that the one they're looking for will be, "Like, eight inches across". 8 is the second Lost number. On Ruby 's online list of potential jobs, there is a temporary position as an inventory control specialist for 8 months. [44] Edit Jefferson 's house number is 316, [45] a reference to Ajira Airways Flight 316. At the market, when the Mad Hatter hears the price for the stuffed rabbit, he says he only has 8 coppers.
